install.name: S5 Column Cart
install.author: Shape 5
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2008 Shape 5 LLC. All rights reserved.
install.description: Shows your cart contents in column format. By Shape5.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items

param.name: introtext
param.label: Text
param.description: This is the intro text that is displayed below the first check out now button

param.name: imageortext
param.label: Choose Image or Text
param.description: Use an image or text for your checkout button?

param.name: buttonimage
param.label: Buttom Image
param.description: This is the image that is displayed above and below the module for the check out now button

param.name: buttontext
param.label: Buttom Text
param.description: This is the text that is displayed above and below the module for the check out now button

param.name: textsize
param.label: Text Size
param.description: Changes the text size for the module
